items.title: Study: ~200 Instacart shoppers across four cities saw different prices for the same item from the same store at the same time; Instacart says it's running tests (Ben Casselman/New York Times)
items.summary:
Ben Casselman / New York Times:
Study: ~200 Instacart shoppers across four cities saw different prices for the same item from the same store at the same time; Instacart says it's running tests  —  The findings are the latest example of how the notion of a single price is breaking down in the digital age, a trend economists say could be pushing up some prices.

items.title: Tenways’ Holiday Season Sale gives the new Wayfarer cruiser e-bike its largest $366 FREE bundle at its $1,899 low, more
items.summary:
Tenways has launched its Holiday Season Sale with up to $500 e-bike discounts, alongside the usual extra $100 savings for select careers/students, as well as a bonus $300 savings when buying two e-bikes together. Among the lineup, we’re seeing Tenways’ all-new Wayfarer Cruiser e-bike at $1,899 shipped, and also getting the largest bundle to date of $366 in FREE gear. This model just hit the market at the tail-end of October with a $300 launch discount from its $2,199 full price and getting a $277 bundle – which then extended into the brand’s Black Friday Sale event. Now, you’re getting the same $300 markdown here but with a larger $366 bundle (made up of a rear carrier, mud flaps, a kickstand, and a large pannier bag) for a return low price and the best deal we’ve seen yet. Head below to browse the full lineup of deals during this Holiday Season Sale.

more…

items.title: Anker SOLIX teases early Christmas deals with a 72-hour flash sale taking up to $3,734 off power stations from $371
items.summary:
Anker SOLIX has launched a collection of 72-hour flash sales as early Christmas deals, which will be lasting through December 11 for folks who want to score theirs ahead of the upcoming holiday sale. Among the lineup, the brand’s new C1000 Gen 2 Portable Power Station is down at $371.45 shipped, and matching the price over at Amazon. Only on the market since September, it’s coming down from its $799 MSRP with $428 cut from the tag, which we’ve seen on average keeping down around $449, and is only beaten out by the $349 low we spotted during its full Black Friday event two weeks ago. This is still a great value at the second-best price we have tracked, which you can learn more about below or by reading our hands-on tested review here. You’ll also find the other flash offers below.

more…

items.title: Heybike’s Christmas Sale saves you up to $800 on e-bikes alongside up to $266 FREE gear/gifts starting from $999
items.summary:
Heybike has officially switched lanes and launched its Christmas Sale with up to $800 e-bike discounts alongside FREE bundled gear and gifts. One notable return is the ALPHA All-Terrain Mid-Drive e-bike with $266 in FREE gear + a gift pack at $1,299 shipped. Coming down far and fast from its $1,699 MSRP right out the gate, we only saw temporary flash offerings to this price during the brand’s early Black Friday Sale, until the full event kicked off on the actual day of the shopping holiday, but it’s coming back immediately for this sale. You’re saving $400 off the tag with this deal for the all-time lowest price we have tracked, while also scoring $266 in FREE gear (a steel cable lock, helmet, waterproof backpack, and large cargo basket) and a mystery gift pack like we saw during last month’s sales events. Head below to learn more about this e-bike and the full lineup of deals while this Christmas Sale lasts.

items.title: Give your Xbox Series X|S a storage boost for the holidays with Seagate’s 1TB Expansion Card down at $103 all-time low
items.summary:
As part of a wider PC components and accessories sale, Woot is offering Seagate’s 1TB Storage Expansion card for Xbox down at $102.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This plug-and-play storage drive originally hit the scene carrying a $220 price tag, although it has lately been sitting at the $150 mark at Amazon. Today’s offer shaves $47 off its usual price and comes in $15 under its previous all-time low. It’s the best price we’ve seen for the 1TB model so far, making this a great time to cash in and boost your console’s storage heading into the holidays. Head below for more details.

items.title: First deal strikes DJI’s latest Mic 3 complete set with charging case down at $260 (All-time low)
items.summary:
Alongside its now live Apple sale event offers, Best Buy is offering the complete DJI Mic 3 set for $259.99 shipped. This particular set of the brand’s latest lavalier microphone with two transmitters, one receiver, and charging case typically goes for $330, so you’re looking at a straight-up $70 discount on it today. The Mic 3 is the brand’s new release that hit the scene in August, and today’s deal lands as its first discount. Deals on DJI products have been hard to come by lately thanks to spotty stock across retailers – even Amazon mostly shows third-party listings like this one for the Mic 3 set at $259. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this set to date, so you might want to jump in there quickly before it sells out.

more…

On the market since May and dropping from their full $100 and $130 price tags, we’ve seen these kits go as low as $70 and $90 before today. Now, you’re getting larger-than-ever $40 and $52 markdowns that drop the costs to new all-time low prices.
